entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:13 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Overcast. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:13 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
